hooks: "my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored"
"i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found"
csv:
Hook,Slide 1,Slide 2,Slide 3,Slide 4,Slide 5
my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored,"3 doctors told me to accept the pain
'you're not 20 anymore'
but something felt wrong","i spent $2400 on special shoes
did all their exercises
took their supplements","then i found my old x-ray
same exact issue was there
they never even looked","turns out it wasn't aging at all
it was treatable this whole time
my Vibit changed everything","now i can garden for hours
walk with my grandkids
and proved them all wrong"
i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found,"'just part of getting older' they said
while writing another prescription
i almost believed them","spent 2 years trying
compression socks
stretches
even gave up walking","then my neighbor showed me her before/after
same symptoms
but she could walk again","she introduced me to Vibit
it wasn't age - it was pressure points
everything changed in weeks","now i'm back to traveling
dancing at weddings
living the life they said was over"
